title: NexusApiContracts
description: Registry of API contracts for all endpoints in the project

contracts.description: All API contracts registered in the project

id.description: Unique contract identifier, used in task references and context packets

path.description: URL path for this endpoint, e.g. /api/users/:id

operationId.description: Unique operation name, matching the handler function or OpenAPI operationId

requestSchema.description: JSON Schema for the request body, query params, and path params

body.description: JSON Schema for the request body

query.description: JSON Schema for query string parameters

responseSchema.description: JSON Schema for possible response bodies keyed by HTTP status code

additionalProperties.description: JSON Schema for the response body at this status code

version.description: Contract version, e.g. v1, v2, or a semver string

deprecated.description: Whether this contract is deprecated and should not be used in new code

moduleId.description: The module that owns this endpoint

tags.description: Optional categorization tags for grouping related contracts

authentication.description: Authentication scheme required for this endpoint

lastUpdated.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of the last contract registry update
